permafrost.tundra.lang

Class CharsetHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.lang.CharsetHelper

  • public class CharsetHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with Charset objects.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.nio.charset.Charset DEFAULT_CHARSET
      The default character set used by Tundra.
      static java.lang.String DEFAULT_CHARSET_NAME
      The default character set name used by Tundra.

      Returns a new byte[] by converting the given byte[] from the input charset to the output charset, unless the two charsets are equal in which case the given byte[] is returned as is.

      Returns a new byte[] by converting the given byte[] from the input charset to the output charset, unless the two charsets are equal in which case the given byte[] is returned as is.

    • Method Detail

      • normalize

        public static java.nio.charset.Charset normalize(java.lang.String charsetName)
        Normalizes the given charset name as a Charset object.
        Parameters:
        charsetName - The character set name to normalize.
        Returns:
        The Charset representing the given name, or a default Charset if the given name is null.

      • normalize

        public static java.nio.charset.Charset normalize(java.lang.String charsetName,
                                                 java.nio.charset.Charset defaultCharset)
        Normalizes the given charset name as a Charset object.
        Parameters:
        charsetName - The character set name to normalize.
        defaultCharset - The default character set to return if the given name is null.
        Returns:
        The Charset representing the given name, or a default Charset if the given name is null.

      • normalize

        public static java.nio.charset.Charset normalize(java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        Normalizes the given Charset object.
        Parameters:
        charset - The character set to normalize.
        Returns:
        The normalized character set.

      • normalize

        public static java.nio.charset.Charset normalize(java.nio.charset.Charset charset,
                                                 java.nio.charset.Charset defaultCharset)
        Normalizes the given Charset object.
        Parameters:
        charset - The character set to normalize.
        defaultCharset - The default character set to return if the given charset is null.
        Returns:
        The normalized character set.

      • convert

        public static byte[] convert(byte[] content,
                             java.nio.charset.Charset inCharset,
                             java.nio.charset.Charset outCharset)
        Returns a new byte[] by converting the given byte[] from the input charset to the output charset, unless the two charsets are equal in which case the given byte[] is returned as is.
        Parameters:
        content - The text content to be converted to another charset.
        inCharset - The charset the text content is currently encoded with.
        outCharset - The charset the returned converted text content will be encoded with.
        Returns:
        The given text content converted from one charset to another.

      • convert

        public static byte[] convert(byte[] content,
                             java.lang.String inCharsetName,
                             java.lang.String outCharsetName)
        Returns a new byte[] by converting the given byte[] from the input charset to the output charset, unless the two charsets are equal in which case the given byte[] is returned as is.
        Parameters:
        content - The text content to be converted to another charset.
        inCharsetName - The charset the text content is currently encoded with.
        outCharsetName - The charset the returned converted text content will be encoded with.
        Returns:
        The given text content converted from one charset to another.

      • convert

        public static java.io.InputStream convert(java.io.InputStream content,
                                          java.nio.charset.Charset inCharset,
                                          java.nio.charset.Charset outCharset)
                                   throws java.io.IOException
        Returns a new InputStream by converting the given InputStream from the input charset to the output charset, unless the two charsets are equal in which case the given InputStream is returned as is.
        Parameters:
        content - The text content to be converted to another charset.
        inCharset - The charset the text content is currently encoded with.
        outCharset - The charset the returned converted text content will be encoded with.
        Returns:
        The given text content converted from one charset to another.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an I/O error occurs.
